column2: textInput("geo_location", labelMandatory("Geographic Area Assessed")),
label: Geographic Area Assessed

column2: selectInput("tax_grp", labelMandatory("Major Taxonomic Group"), c("Vascular Plant", "Nonvascular Plant", "Lichen", "Invert-Insect", "Invert-Mollusk", "Invert-Other", "Fish", "Amphibian", "Reptile", "Mammal", "Bird")),
label: Major Taxonomic Group

column2: textInput("species_name", labelMandatory("Species Scientific Name")),
label: Species Scientific Name

column2: textInput("common_name", "Common Name"),
label: Common Name

column2: checkboxInput("cave", "Check if the species is an obligate of caves or groundwater systems"),
label: Check if the species is an obligate of caves or groundwater systems

column2: checkboxInput("mig", "Check if species is migratory and you wish to enter exposure data for the migratory range that lies outside of the assessment area"),
label: Check if species is migratory and you wish to enter exposure data for the migratory range that lies outside of the assessment area

column2: get_file_ui("clim_var_dir", "Folder location of prepared climate data", type = "dir", mandatory = TRUE, spinner = TRUE)
label: Folder location of prepared climate data

column2: get_file_ui("range_poly_pth", "Range polygon shapefile", mandatory = TRUE),
label: Range polygon shapefile

column2: get_file_ui("assess_poly_pth", "Assessment area polygon shapefile", mandatory = TRUE),
label: Assessment area polygon shapefile

column2: get_file_ui("ptn_poly_pth", "Physiological thermal niche file"),
label: Physiological thermal niche file

column2: get_file_ui("nonbreed_poly_pth", "Non-breeding Range polygon shapefile"),
label: Non-breeding Range polygon shapefile

column2: selectInput("rng_chg_used", "Will a projected range change raster be supplied?", c("No" = "no", "Yes, one range change raster will be supplied for all scenarios" = "one", "Yes, multiple range change rasters will be supplied, one for each scenario (Preferred)" = "multiple")),
label: Will a projected range change raster be supplied?
options: c("No" = "no", "Yes, one range change raster will be supplied for all scenarios" = "one", "Yes, multiple range change rasters will be supplied, one for each scenario (Preferred)" = "multiple")),

column2: get_file_ui(paste0("rng_chg_pth", "_", .y), .x))
from_to_ui("lost", "Lost:", c(-1, -1)),
label: Lost:

column2: from_to_ui( "maint","Maintained:", c(0, 0)),
label: Maintained:

column2: from_to_ui( "gain","Gained:", c(1,1)),
label: Gained:

column2: from_to_ui( "ns","Not Suitable:", c(99, 99)),
label: Not Suitable:

column2: numericInput("gain_mod", NULL, 1, min = 0, max = 1, step = 0.1),
label: NULL

column2: textAreaInput("gain_mod_comm", "Gain modifier explanation")
label: Gain modifier explanation

column2: check_comment_ui("B1", "1) Exposure to sea level rise:", choiceNames = valueNms, choiceValues = valueOpts),
label: 1) Exposure to sea level rise:

column2: check_comment_ui("B2a", "2a) Distribution relative to natural barriers", choiceNames = valueNms, choiceValues = valueOpts),
label: 2a) Distribution relative to natural barriers

column2: check_comment_ui("B2b", "2b) Distribution relative to anthropogenic barriers", choiceNames = valueNms, choiceValues = valueOpts),
label: 2b) Distribution relative to anthropogenic barriers

column2: check_comment_ui("B3", " 3) Predicted impact of land use changes resulting from human responses to climate change", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 3) Predicted impact of land use changes resulting from human responses to climate change

column2: check_comment_ui("C1", "1) Dispersal and movements",choiceNames = valueNms, choiceValues = valueOpts),
label: 1) Dispersal and movements

column2: check_comment_ui("C2bii", "ii) physiological hydrological niche.", choiceNames = valueNms, choiceValues = valueOpts),
label: ii) physiological hydrological niche.

column2: check_comment_ui("C2c", "2c) Dependence on a specific disturbance regime likely to be impacted by climate change.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 2c) Dependence on a specific disturbance regime likely to be impacted by climate change.

column2: check_comment_ui("C2d", "2d) Dependence on ice, ice-edge, or snow-cover habitats.", choiceNames = valueNms, choiceValues = valueOpts),
label: 2d) Dependence on ice, ice-edge, or snow-cover habitats.

column2: check_comment_ui("C3", "3) Restriction to uncommon landscape/geological features or derivatives.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 3) Restriction to uncommon landscape/geological features or derivatives.

column2: check_comment_ui("C4a", "4a) Dependence on other species to generate required habitat.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 4a) Dependence on other species to generate required habitat.

column2: check_comment_ui("C4b", "4b) Dietary versatility (animals only).", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4])
label: 4b) Dietary versatility (animals only).

column2: check_comment_ui("C4c", "4c) Pollinator versatility (plants only).", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4])
label: 4c) Pollinator versatility (plants only).

column2: check_comment_ui("C4d", "4d) Dependence on other species for propagule dispersal.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 4d) Dependence on other species for propagule dispersal.

column2: check_comment_ui("C4e", "4e) Sensitivity to pathogens or natural enemies.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 4e) Sensitivity to pathogens or natural enemies.

column2: check_comment_ui("C4f", "4f) Sensitivity to competition from native or non-native species.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 4f) Sensitivity to competition from native or non-native species.

column2: check_comment_ui("C4g", "4g) Forms part of an interspecific interaction not covered by 4a-f.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 4g) Forms part of an interspecific interaction not covered by 4a-f.

column2: check_comment_ui("C5a", "5a) Measured genetic variation.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 5a) Measured genetic variation.

column2: check_comment_ui("C5b", "5b) Occurrence of bottlenecks in recent evolutionary history (use only if 5a is unknown).", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 5b) Occurrence of bottlenecks in recent evolutionary history (use only if 5a is unknown).

column2: check_comment_ui("C5c", "5c) Reproductive system (plants only; use only if C5a and C5b are unknown).", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4])
label: 5c) Reproductive system (plants only; use only if C5a and C5b are unknown).

column2: check_comment_ui("C6", "6) Phenological response to changing seasonal temperature and precipitation dynamics.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4])
label: 6) Phenological response to changing seasonal temperature and precipitation dynamics.

column2: check_comment_ui("D1", "1) Documented response to recent climate change. ", choiceNames = valueNms, choiceValues = valueOpts),
label: 1) Documented response to recent climate change.

column2: check_comment_ui("D4", "4) Occurrence of protected areas in modeled future distribution.", choiceNames = valueNms[2:4], choiceValues = valueOpts[2:4]),
label: 4) Occurrence of protected areas in modeled future distribution.
